results.name: Triangular array T read by rows: T(n,k)=number of nonzero remainders when Euclidean algorithm acts on n and k, for k=1,2,...,n, n=1,2,...
mathematica: Table[T[n, k], {n, 1, 13}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 12 2019, after _Robert Israel_ in A107435 *)
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
